## extractBrandFilePaths {#symbol-function-extractbrandfilepaths}

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function extractBrandFilePaths(brandYamlPath, onWarning?): string[];
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts:299](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/b137ce01c347ae00b9119bd3b64f63ca147770fe/packages/core/src/operations/brand.ts#L299)

Extract all local file paths referenced in a brand YAML file.

Extracts paths from:

- logo.images.\* (string or { path, alt } objects).
- logo.small, logo.medium, logo.large (string or { light, dark } objects).
- typography.fonts[].files where source is "file".

### Parameters

| Parameter       | Type                  | Description                                                   |
| --------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `brandYamlPath` | `string`              | Absolute path to the brand YAML file                          |
| `onWarning?`    | (`message`) => `void` | Optional callback for non-fatal warnings (e.g., parse errors) |

### Returns

`string[]`

Array of unique relative file paths

Install an extension from a source.

| Parameter | Type                                                               | Description          |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------- |
| `source`  | [`InstallSource`](operations.qmd#symbol-typealias-installsource)   | Installation source  |

### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// Install from GitHub
const source = parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
const result = await install(source, { projectDir: "." });

await install(source, {
  projectDir: ".",
  onProgress: ({ phase, message }) => console.log(`[${phase}] ${message}`),
});
```

## parseInstallSource {#symbol-function-parseinstallsource}

```{.ts filename="TypeScript"}
function parseInstallSource(input, checkExists?): InstallSource;
```

Defined in: [packages/core/src/operations/install.ts:174](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard/blob/b137ce01c347ae00b9119bd3b64f63ca147770fe/packages/core/src/operations/install.ts#L174)

Parse an install source string.

### Parameters

| Parameter     | Type                  | Default value   | Description                                    |
| ------------- | --------------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------------- |
| `input`       | `string`              | `undefined`     | Source string (GitHub ref, URL, or local path) |
| `checkExists` | (`path`) => `boolean` | `fs.existsSync` | -                                              |

### Returns

[`InstallSource`](operations.qmd#symbol-typealias-installsource)

Parsed InstallSource

### Example

```{.typescript filename="TypeScript"}
// GitHub reference
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/fontawesome");
// { type: "github", owner: "quarto-ext", repo: "fontawesome", version: { type: "latest" } }

// GitHub with version
parseInstallSource("quarto-ext/lightbox@v1.0.0");
// { type: "github", ..., version: { type: "tag", tag: "v1.0.0" } }

// URL
parseInstallSource("https://example.com/ext.zip");
// { type: "url", url: "https://example.com/ext.zip" }

// Local path
parseInstallSource("./my-extension");
// { type: "local", path: "./my-extension" }
```
